subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Kobe Bryant and Derek Fisher hit 3-pointers during an 8-2 run in the final minute, and the Lakers held on against the Jazz for a commanding 3-0 series lead.
snippet: Kobe Bryant and Derek Fisher hit 3-pointers during an 8-2 run in the final minute, and the Lakers held on against the Jazz for a commanding 3-0 series lead.
